Articles.Content: Just wondering if there are any mods that add the [Moon illusion](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Moon_illusion) to the game?

It can't really be "added," since it's an optical illusion based on human perception. The illusion should already be present. However, the lack of clouds and other stuff near the horizon for Mun to be compared to probably makes the effect much weaker.
Wow. That's one of the less informative Wikipedia page I ever saw. "It's not that, could be this but may actually be that"
